title: Code 2
summaries: The Code 2 is a Hardmode yoyo purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 25, after at least one of the mechanical bosses has been defeated. It can be held in the air indefinitely, and is an upgrade from Code 1.
It can reach up to 18 tiles.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 54 / 47 (Melee)
statistics.Buy: 25
statistics.Sell: 5
